title: Vascular Risk and Diagnoses Questionnaire UC Davis Alzheimer’s Disease Center

elements.title: Completed By
Relationship to Patient:

elements.html:
Please respond to the following questions to the best of your ability. They are to be answered based on the Patient’s medical history. If you do not know the exact year in which a given condition first began or was diagnosed, please use your best judgement to approximate the year. A list of commonly prescribed medications is included on pages 5-6 for your convenience to aide you in identifying which condition(s) your medications may be treating.
Please answer each question as thoroughly as possible. The more information you provide, the better your doctor will be able to help you.

elements.title: 1.Have You ever been diagnosed with a medical condition related to high or elevated blood pressure?
elements.popupdescription:
below are some of the term(s) that may have been used by your doctor to describe elevated blood pressure:
Hypertension
Malignant Hypertension
Elevated Blood Pressure
Diastolic Hypertension
Renal Hypertension
Borderline Hypertension
Systolic Hypertension
Reno-vascular Hypertension
Prehypertension

elements.title: Approximately in what year did you first receive this diagnosis?
Were you ever treated for this condition
Are you currently treating this condition?
Please indicate how you are treating the condition?
elements.description: Medication/supplements (please list the medications you believe to be taking for this condition):

elements.title: Other medication
2. Have you ever been diagnosed with a medical condition related to high or elevated cholesterol levels?
elements.popupdescription:
below are some of the term(s) that may have been used by your doctor to elevated cholesterol:
High Cholesterol
High HDL and/or LDL levels
High Triglycerides
Hypercholesterolemia
Lipid Disorder
Hyperlipidemia
Hypertriglyceridemia

elements.title: Approximately in what year did you first receive this diagnosis?
Were you ever treated for this condition

Please indicate how you are treating the condition?

elements.title: Other medication
3.Have you ever been diagnosed with a medical condition related to Diabetes Mellitus?
elements.popupdescription:
below are some of the term(s) that may have been used by your doctor to describe diabetes:
Diabetes Type I
High Blood Glucose/Sugar
Abnormal Glycated Hemoglobin
Diabetes Type II or Adult-Onset
Hyperglycemia Level (HbA1c)
Insulin-dependent Diabetes
Insufficient Fasting
Abnormal Glucose Tolerance
Non-insulin dependent Diabetes
Prediabetes
Glucose (IFG)
Brittle Diabetes
Abnormal Fasting Plasma
Metabolic Syndrome
Insulin Resistance
Glucose Level (FPG)

4. Have you ever been diagnosed with a medical condition related to kidney health or function?
elements.popupdescription:
below are some of the term(s) that may have been used by your doctor to describe kidney problems:
Kidney Disease
Chronic Kidney Disease
Nephropathy
Renal Disease or Failure
Impaired Kidney Function

5.Have you ever been diagnosed with a medical condition related to heart health or function?
elements.popupdescription:
below are some of the term(s) that may have been used by your doctor to describe heart problems:
Heart Disease
Arrhythmia
Bypass Surgery
Hypertensive Heart Disease
Heart Attack/Cardiac Arrest
Cardiac Bypass Procedure
Coronary Heart Disease
Atrial Fibrillation
Heart Valve Problems
Congestive Heart Failure
(unsteady heartbeat, flutter)
Pacemaker
Angina (chest pain)
Coronary Angioplasty/Stent

6.Have you ever been diagnosed with a medical condition related to artery/vascular health or function?
elements.popupdescription:
below are some of the term(s) that may have been used by your doctor to describe vascular disease:
Arterial Disease
Carotid Artery Disease
Carotid Endarterectomy
Atherosclerosis
Carotid Bruit
TIA or “mini-stroke”
Intermittent Claudication
Carotid Stenosis
Stroke
Peripheral Vascular Disease
Carotid Surgery
